overview:
As co-founder of Creative Capital Group, Jeff oversees our start-up strategy and management consulting initiatives. By architecting strategies that combine traditional business processes with the newest in technological advancements, Jeff has been able to take our clients visions and develop business models that lead to profitable, growth-oriented companies. Jeff has developed a deep understanding of the capital raising process, working with entrepreneurs to develop highly targeted business plans and implementation strategies for optimal growth.

Prior to CCG, Jeff was an integral part of two next-generation technology and internet focused hedge funds / private equity firms in NYC, successfully working with some of todayâ€™s most innovative companies. Jeffâ€™s finance experience, coupled with starting multiple technology businesses over the years, provides clients an intriguing mix of real-world experience that leads to stronger results. Jeffâ€™s additional Wall Street experience includes positions in high-yield institutional trading, business development/fundraising, and mergers & acquisitions.
